name: Puddle (itch) (smcgregor)
description: This game was made by the following undergraduates and researchers at Yale University. Samantha Trimboli, a student in the Computing and the Arts program and a digital artist, worked as our art director. Roxanne Harris, a student of computer science and a live coding music performer, worked as our music composer. Eric Liu, a student of cognitive science and research assistant at the Human Nature Lab, worked as our project manager and our lead narrative designer. Conrad Lee, a temporary expert at Yale's Blended Reality Lab, and Johannes Sieberer, a researcher at Yale's Blended Reality Lab, were our software engineers. Shayne McGregor, also a researcher at the Blended Reality Lab, worked on level design.
